column4: i can't get mplayer to work.  It says "New_Face failed. Maybe the font path is wrong.  Please supply the text font file (~/.mplayer/subfont.ttf)."
here's what u can do... Go to /usr/share/fonts/truetype ... get to a .ttf file, copy it to home folder, and from the pref of ure mplayer, locate and select that ttf file!
